name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Follower Sudo - Export Instagram Account Followers for FREE

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export any Instagram user's Followers and export the list of users who liked a post all for FREE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Follower Sudo gives you super powers while using Instagram.

- Export the FOLLOWER of an Instagram user to excel/csv (NOTE: only the first 1k followers will be exported due to Instagram limits)

- Export the FOLLOWING list of an Instagram user to excel/csv (NOTE: only the first 1k followed users will be exported due to Instagram limits)

- Export the LIKERS of a Post to excel/csv (NOTE: only the first 100 likers will be exported due to Instagram limits)

- Download Instagram videos

- Download Instagram Images

All features are FREE and require no paid subscriptions.

The goal is to add various more features to this extension, so if you have any suggestions or spot any missing features, please do not hesitate to share this via the Support channel, and we'll be happy to implement it.

NOTE ⚠️
This is extension is an independent project and is not in anyway affiliated with Instagram.
